data.text:
Tracie Thoms Born: August 19, 1975

Baltimore, Maryland, USA Role: Bonnie Wyms IMDb profile

Tracie Thoms (born August 19, 1975; age 48) played Bonnie Wyms during Season 2 of The Shield.

Biography and career[]

Tracie Thoms was born and raised in Baltimore, Maryland. She is the daughter of Donald H. Thoms, a VP of Programming at PBS and television director, and wife Mariana Davis. Thoms has a younger brother, Austin. She started studying acting at age 10 and later on attended the Baltimore School for the Arts. Thoms earned a Bachelor's degree from Howard University in 1997, and went on to Juilliard School's Drama Division as a member of Group 30 (1997â€“2001). Her class included actors Lee Pace and Anthony Mackie.

Thoms started her career appearing in the TV show As If, as well as in a couple of TV movies in 2002. Through her career, she has appeared in other TV shows like Cold Case, The Good Wife, and The Mindy Project. From 2018 to 2020, she has played Karen Wilson on the show 9-1-1.

Aside from TV, Thomas has also worked on films like The Devil Wears Prada, Death Proof, Looper, and Annie.

The Shield credits[]

Season 2 : "Dominoes Falling"

Selected filmography[]

Jerry and Marge Go Large (2022)

Yes Day (2021)

Boy Genius (2019)

Annie (2014)

Looper (2012)

Death Proof (2007)

The Devil Wears Prada (2006)

Brother to Brother (2004)

Television appearances

9-1-1 (2018-2022)

Station 19 (2020-2022)

The Mindy Project (2016)

The Good Wife (2013)

Cold Case (2005-2010)

The Shield (2003)

As If (2002)
